note: HalfRain eStore LLC - is the ultimate destination for your Microsoft OS, software, and licensing needs! As a Microsoft Partner, (parent company: GarbageFile.ORG)we specialize in sales of Windows, Windows Server, and Remote Desktop Services for computers, servers, and datacenters. Our cost-effective solutions make us the go-to choice for businesses and individuals looking to upgrade their software without overspending. We understand that software infrastructure can be expensive.
